title: Does anyone else have an issue with not being able to drag around rune/mastery pages .-.
body: I think it would be great if you can actually organise your pages without having to make a new one each time -.- anyone else agree or is it just me .-.

replies.body: It would be a small and easy QoL change that should be done. Won't do anything to the actual game, but would make us happier.

a drag-and-drop mechanic would be incredibly difficult to implement, id imagine. there is literally nothing but straight links on everything to do with the client. links being; input click - activate function.

>small and easy

You clearly don't understand how coding works for a client this fucking old.
They really need to update the damn client :/
